{{Wired embedded system |brand=Ubiquiti Networks |model=EdgeRouter |revision=PRO (ERPro-8) |upc=810354020636 |asin=B00IA5J8M8 |newegg=9SIAJ7W8HW5173 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |type=router |pwr_v=110-240 |pwr_amp=0.5 |pwr_conn=C5 |pwr_vac=true |pwr_ac_hz=50/60 |cpu1_brand=Cavium |cpu1_model=CN6120 |cpu1_cspeed=1 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=4 GiB |fla1_brand=SanDisk |fla1_model=SDIN7DP2-4G |fla2=8 |fla2_brand=Macronix |fla2_model=MX29LV640ETTI-70G |ram1=2 GiB |ram1_brand=Kingston |ram1_model=KVR16S11S6/2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, SFP |expansion_usb_num=1 |expansion_sfp_num=2 |jtag=yes,, 14-pin header,, unpopulated,, J2 |serial=yes,, console,, RJ45,, (115200 8N1) |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Broadcom |eth_chip2_model=B50280C1;B50280C1KFBG; |eth_chip3_brand=Broadcom |eth_chip3_model=BCM5482 |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=6 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=2 |addl_chips=16Mbit SPI Serial Flash;cFeon;QH16-104HIP;;1;,,, Multichannel RS-232 Line Driver;Texas Instruments;MA3221C;;1;,,, PCIe 3.0 Clock Generator with 1 HCSL Outputs;Pericom;P16C557;;1;,,, 2A, 1MHz Synchronous-Rectified Buck Converter;uPI Semi; uP9617;;6;,,, 3A, 4.5-27V Simple Buck Regulator;Alpha & Omega (Α&Ω);AOZ1212;;4;,,, 30V N-Channel MOSFET;Alpha & Omega (Α&Ω);AO4566;;1;,,, 30V N-Channel Power MOSFET;Unisonic Tech;UT4392G;;1;,,, 3-State Quad Buffer/Line Driver;NXP;74LVC125A;;6;,,, 2A Schottky Barrier Rectifier;Diodes Inc;B260/A;;4; |flags=2x SFP/RJ45 Combo ports |stock_boot=U-Boot;2012.04.01; |stock_os=Linux;3.4.27-UBNT;EdgeOS; |tp_firmware=OpenWrt, |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=ubnt |default_pass=ubnt |oui_eth=FC:EC:DA }} {{TagLine|Ubiquiti EdgeMAX EdgeRouter PRO (ERPro-8)}} :''8-Port Router with 2 SFP/RJ45 Ports'' (Rack 19") :[https://www.ubnt.com/edgemax/edgerouter-pro/ Product page] {{•}} [https://help.ubnt.com/hc/en-us/categories/200321064-EdgeMAX Support page] ([https://www.ui.com/products/#edgemax ''EdgeMAX'' series]) :[https://www.ubnt.com/downloads/guides/edgemax/EdgeOS_UG.pdf User's Guide] {{•}} [https://www.ubnt.com/downloads/guides/edgemax/EdgeRouter_ERPro-8_QSG.pdf Quick Start Guide] {{•}} [https://www.ubnt.com/downloads/datasheets/edgemax/EdgeRouter_DS.pdf Datasheet] {{See also|Cavium|MediaTek|Ubiquiti Networks}} ===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/lanwan/lanwan-reviews/32398-ubiquiti-edgemax-edgerouter-pro-reviewed ''EdgeRouter PRO'' Reviewed on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] ===Forum threads=== *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=176157 ''EdgeRouter LITE/PRO'' on '''DD-WRT''' forums]

*[https://community.ubnt.com/t5/EdgeMAX/EdgeRouter-Pro-CPU/td-p/654599 ''EdgeRouter PRO CPU'' on '''UBNT''' forums] :*'''e50 : (X/X-SFP)''' : @880MHz (Dual core [[MIPS 1004Kc]]) without offload ::CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7621AT (with HNAT, QOS and others features) :*'''e100/e110 (USG/LITE/POE)''' : @500MHz (Dual core [[MIPS64]]) with offload ::CPU: [[Cavium]] ''Octeon Plus'' CN5020-500SCP :*'''e200 (ER-8/PRO)''' : @800MHz/@1GHz (Dual core [[MIPS64]]) with offload ::CPU: [[Cavium]] ''Octeon II'' [http://cavium.com/OCTEON-II_CN61XX.html CN6120]-800SCP/1000SCP (1MB L2 cache) *[https://community.ubnt.com/t5/EdgeMAX/EdgeRouter-Pro-RAM-Upgrade/td-p/653451 ''EdgeRouter PRO - RAM Upgrade'' on '''UBNT''' forums] :RAM: 2GB (DDR3-1333 SO-DIMM), upgrade to 4/8GB DDR3 (Samsung)

===See also=== :;[[Ubiquiti Networks]] • [https://www.ui.com/products/#edgemax ''EdgeMAX'' Router series] • [https://www.ui.com/edgemax/comparison/ Model comparison] *[[Ubiquiti Networks EdgeRouter]] (ER-8) - 8-Port Router {{SCollapse|8x GbE (RJ45) ports |
dmesg|grep -i cpu
CPU revision is: 000d9301 (Cavium Octeon II)
# cat /proc/cpuinfo 
processor		: 0
cpu model		: Cavium Octeon II V0.1
BogoMIPS		: 1600.00
}} *[[Ubiquiti Networks EdgeRouter LITE]] (ERLite-3) - 3-Port Gigabit Router :3x GbE (RJ45) ports *[[Ubiquiti Networks EdgeRouter POE]] (ERPoe-5) - 5-Port Router with PoE :5x GbE (RJ45) ports, 24/48V Passive PoE *[[Ubiquiti Networks EdgeRouter PRO]] (ERPro-8) - 8-Port Router with 2 SFP/RJ45 Combo ports :6x GbE (RJ45) ports, 2x SFP/RJ45 Combo ports *[[Ubiquiti Networks EdgeRouter X]] (ER-X) - Advanced Gigabit Ethernet Router :5x GbE (RJ45) ports, 24V Passive PoE (In/Out), Passthrough *[[Ubiquiti Networks EdgeRouter X SFP]] (ER-X-SFP) - Advanced Gigabit Router with PoE and SFP :5x GbE (RJ45) ports, 1x SFP port, 24V Passive PoE *[[Ubiquiti Networks EdgeRouter 4]] (ER-4) - 4-Port Gigabit Router with 1 SFP Port :3x GbE (RJ45) ports, 1x SFP port *[[Ubiquiti Networks EdgeRouter 6P]] (ER-6P) - 6-Port Gigabit Router with 1 SFP Port :5x GbE (RJ45) ports, 1x SFP ports, PoE support on RJ45 ports *[[Ubiquiti Networks EdgeRouter 10X]] (ER-10X) - 10-Port Gigabit Router with PoE Flexibility :10x GbE (RJ45) ports, 24V Passive PoE, Passthrough *[[Ubiquiti Networks EdgeRouter 12]] (ER-12) - 10-Port Gigabit Router with PoE and 2 SFP Ports :10x GbE (RJ45) ports, 2x SFP ports, 24V Passive PoE, Passthrough *[[Ubiquiti Networks EdgeRouter 12P]] (ER-12P) - 10-Port Gigabit PoE Router and 2 SFP Ports :10x GbE (RJ45) ports, 2x SFP ports, PoE support on RJ45 ports *[[Ubiquiti Networks EdgeRouter Infinity]] (ER-8-XG) - 10G SFP+ ''EdgeRouter'' Infinity Router :8x 10G SFP+ ports, 1x GbE (RJ45) port, Dual Power Supply *[[Ubiquiti Networks EdgePoint]] R6 (EP-R6) - Intelligent WISP Control Point with FiberProtect *[[Ubiquiti Networks airCube]] - ''airMAX'' Home Wi-Fi Access Point (2.4/5GHz) • [https://www.ui.com/accessories/aircube/ PPage] __NOTOC__
